message.content: {"nodes":[{"id":"startProcess","name":"Start Process","elementType":"startEvent","description":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"submitExpense","description":"Starts the expense reimbursement process"}],"properties":null},{"id":"submitExpense","name":"Submit Expense","elementType":"userTask","description":"User submits an expense for reimbursement","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"validateExpense","description":"Expense submitted for validation"}],"properties":null},{"id":"validateExpense","name":"Validate Expense","elementType":"businessRuleTask","description":"System validates the submitted expense","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"decisionPoint","description":"Expense validation complete"},{"targetNode":"errorHandlerValidation","description":"Error occurred during validation"}],"properties":null},{"id":"decisionPoint","name":"Decision Point","elementType":"exclusiveGateway","description":"Decision point to check if expense is valid","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"validatePolicy","description":"Expense is valid"}, {"targetNode":"endProcessInvalid","description":"Expense is not valid"}],"properties":null},{"id":"validatePolicy","name":"Validate Policy","elementType":"businessRuleTask","description":"System validates if the expense is within policy limits","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"decisionPointPolicy","description":"Policy validation complete"},{"targetNode":"errorHandlerPolicy","description":"Error occurred during policy validation"}],"properties":null},{"id":"decisionPointPolicy","name":"Decision Point Policy","elementType":"exclusiveGateway","description":"Decision point to check if expense is within policy","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"receiptCheck","description":"Expense is within policy"}, {"targetNode":"endProcessRejected","description":"Expense is not within policy"}],"properties":null},{"id":"receiptCheck","name":"Receipt Check","elementType":"businessRuleTask","description":"System checks if matching receipts are available","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"decisionPointReceipt","description":"Receipt check complete"},{"targetNode":"errorHandlerReceipt","description":"Error occurred during receipt check"}],"properties":null},{"id":"decisionPointReceipt","name":"Decision Point Receipt","elementType":"exclusiveGateway","description":"Decision point to check if receipts are missing"}],"properties":null},{"id":"endProcessApproved","name":"End Process Approved","elementType":"endEvent","description":"Expense approved for reimbursement","connectedTo":null,"properties":null},{"id":"endProcessInvalid","name":"End Process Invalid","elementType":"endEvent","description":"Expense not valid for reimbursement","connectedTo":null,"properties":null},{"id":"endProcessReceiptMissing","name":"End Process Receipt Missing","elementType":"endEvent","description":"Expense not approved due to missing receipts","connectedTo":null,"properties":null},{"id":"endProcessRejected","name":"End Process Rejected","elementType":"endEvent","description":"Expense rejected due to other reasons","connectedTo":null,"properties":null},{"id":"errorHandlerValidation","name":"Error Handler Validation","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"Handles errors during expense validation","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"endProcessRejected","description":"Error handling complete"}],"properties":null},{"id":"errorHandlerPolicy","name":"Error Handler Policy","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"Handles errors during policy validation","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"endProcessRejected","description":"Error handling complete"}],"properties":null},{"id":"errorHandlerReceipt","name":"Error Handler Receipt","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"Handles errors during receipt check","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"endProcessRejected","description":"Error handling complete"}],"properties":null}]}
